channel.title: CMU Chemical Engineering
channel.description: Papers by people in the Department of Chemical Engineering at CMU

item.title: Solving an inverse problem with generative models
item.description:
John R. Kitchin, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2025. https://openalex.org/W4411365766
Inverse problems, where we seek the values of inputs to a model that lead to a desired set of outputs, are a challenges subset of problems in science and engineering....
item.author: John R. Kitchin
